name: Fairy Bubble
description:
The fairies have been arrested and the magical world is threatened;

You must free all the fairies by popping the bubbles that trap them.

To free them you must throw your magic balls in the bubbles that hold the fairies.

When you free all the fairies on the island a magic crystal will appear, throwing a magic ball on it will transport you to the next island.

As you progress you will gain new magic balls, pay attention to your magic balls as they work differently.

Yellow balls have normal gravity and bounce when hitting the ground.

Red balls have no gravity and do not need a lot of force to throw them

Blue balls are to teleport you with them you can walk around the islands and castle

Green balls are special bombs to defeat the enemy


After freeing all the fairies and defeating the enemy you will take control of the magical world and explore all the islands, if you dare you can see the magical world from the top.

Travel on this fun and challenging adventure.
